data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Upper Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Upper Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Upper Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 6 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Upper Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, please defend the 350 believers in Upper Siang against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Father, let the threatened of Upper Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Miguba people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, bring yourself glory in Upper Siang. Through your servants plant 6 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Upper Siang, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 350 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Upper Siang
location.people_groups_list: Na, Adi Ramo, Galong, Adi Gallong, Monba, Medog
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Na (90), Adi Ramo (1,400), Galong (80,000), Adi Gallong (17,000), Monba, Medog (4,500)
